greeting: What can CoStrict do for you?
aboutMe: Thanks to the latest breakthroughs in agentic coding capabilities, I can handle complex software development tasks step-by-step. With tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use the browser, and execute terminal commands (after you grant permission), I can assist you in ways that go beyond code completion or tech support. I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.

instructions.wantsToFetch: CoStrict wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

about: AI-Powered Strict Coding Assistant for Enterprises

fileOperations.wantsToRead: CoStrict wants to read this file
fileOperations.wantsToReadMultiple: CoStrict wants to read multiple files
fileOperations.wantsToReadAndXMore: CoStrict wants to read this file and {{count}} more
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict wants to read this file outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: CoStrict wants to edit this file
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict wants to edit this file outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToEditProtected: CoStrict wants to edit a protected configuration file
fileOperations.wantsToApplyBatchChanges: CoStrict wants to apply changes to multiple files
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImage: CoStrict wants to generate an image
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImageOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict wants to generate an image outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImageProtected: CoStrict wants to generate an image in a protected location
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: CoStrict wants to create a new file
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: CoStrict wants to search and replace in this file
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: CoStrict performed search and replace on this file
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: CoStrict wants to insert content into this file
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: CoStrict wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: CoStrict wants to append content to the end of this file

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: CoStrict wants to view the top level files in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: CoStrict viewed the top level files in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict wants to view the top level files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict viewed the top level files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: CoStrict wants to recursively view all files in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: CoStrict recursively viewed all files in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict wants to recursively view all files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict recursively viewed all files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: CoStrict wants to view source code definition names used in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: CoStrict viewed source code definition names used in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict wants to view source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict viewed source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: CoStrict wants to search this directory for {{regex}}
directoryOperations.wantsToSearchOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict wants to search this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}
directoryOperations.didSearchOutsideWorkspace: CoStrict searched this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}

mcp.wantsToUseTool: CoStrict wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: CoStrict wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server

modes.wantsToSwitch: CoStrict wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: CoStrict wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: CoStrict wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode
subtasks.wantsToFinish: CoStrict wants to finish this subtask

browser.rooWantsToUse: CoStrict wants to use the browser

announcement.description: CoStrict {{version}} brings new features and improvements based on your feedback.
announcement.feature1: <bold>Message Queueing</bold>: Queue multiple messages while CoStrict is working, allowing you to continue planning your workflow without interruption.

onboarding: The task list in this workspace is empty. Please enter a task below to get started.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: CoStrict has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?

autoApprovedCostLimitReached.description: CoStrict has reached the auto-approved cost limit of ${{count}}. Would you like to reset the cost and proceed with the task?

shellIntegration.description: This command is running without shell integration. You can disable this warning in CoStrict Settings Terminal, or troubleshoot terminal integration via the link below.

task.connectToCloudDescription: Sign in to CoStrict Cloud to share tasks

modeSelector.description: Specialized personas that tailor CoStrict's behavior.

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: CoStrict wants to search the codebase for {{query}}
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: CoStrict wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}

rooCloudCTA.title: CoStrict Cloud Coming Soon!
rooCloudCTA.description: Run CoStrict agents in the cloud, access your tasks from anywhere, collaborate with others, and more.

slashCommand.wantsToRun: CoStrict wants to run a slash command

test.title: Test
test.description: Automatically generate and run tests to ensure code reliability and stability

debug.title: Troubleshooting
debug.description: The AI looks at error logs and failure descriptions to help identify root causes and provide solutions.

projectWiki.title: Project Document
projectWiki.description: Reverse-engineer code to generate a project knowledge base and rules to help AI and humans understand information and formalize it. High token consumption.

testGuide.title: Test Solution
testGuide.description: Generates executable test solutions based on analysis of project code.
testGuide.initPrompt: Generate test solution for the current project
